name: RebootInto OS
short_description: RebootInto adds icons to your GNOME and Windows desktops for each operating system entry in your GRUB menu.lst. RebootInto integrates with GRUB to allow clicking a "Linux" icon in Windows to reboot into Linux, and vice versa.
